name: Run Gel

field_types.name: Lane
object_types: 50 mL 0.8 Percent Agarose Gel in Gel Box

field_types.name: Fragment
object_types: 50 mL 0.8 Percent Agarose Gel in Gel Box

protocol:
class Protocol

  def main

    operations.retrieve
    
    operations.each do |op|
      op.output("Fragment").copy_inventory(op.input("Lane"))
    end
    
    tin  = operations.io_table "input"
    tout = operations.io_table "output"
    
    show do 
      title "Input Table"
      table tin.all.render
    end
    
    show do 
      title "Output Table"
      table tout.all.render
    end
    
    operations.store(io: "input")
              .store(io: "output") 
    
    return {}
    
  end

end
